shortDescription.default: Better Markdown for SharePoint with Mermaid, Math, and TOC support

longDescription.default: A comprehensive markdown web part for SharePoint with advanced features including styled blockquotes, Mermaid diagrams, KaTeX math rendering, table of contents, syntax highlighting, and more.

features.title: better-markdown-webpart Feature
features.description: The feature that activates elements of the better-markdown-webpart solution.
